text:
Added some Nordson today. Still a little expensive but a 13% drop seemed like an earnings overreaction relative to the rest of the market. 
Over the last 5 years, the only time this dividend king has traded with a higher yield than now was the 2020 market crash. $NDSN
author: Dividend Growth Mindset
